alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:32PM MDT until June 07 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL EL PASO COUNTY... At 232 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Yoder, or 32 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yoder, Ellicott and Rush. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
